name: LV - Light and Void project
description:
LV – A project which should have never seen the light. An old VHS Camera records, for unknown reasons, a flying object light-years away from Earth. The transmission is full of interferences that hide secrets and images. Dive yourself in the cosmic mysteries of LV, an incredibly fast runner game, where every detail, every second and every light-year counts.
Game features:
•Change between L/V while travelling to the speed of light
•Speed and difficulty increase constantly. You will need cosmic reflexes to go beyond
•Discover the secrets of LV as you progress in the game
•More than 21 exciting achievements
•Show your friends who is the best in the official ranking
•Free to play!
